item.title: vRA 8 + NSX-T Blog Series Part 1: vRA 8 Blueprint with Existing NSX-T Networks
item.author: Author
item.description: You can create a vRA 8 blueprint to deploy machines on existing NSX-T networks. Demo Product Versions vSphere 6.5 U3 vRA 8.0.1 (including vRSLCM and vIDM) NSX-T 2.5.1 vSAN 6.6.1 Prerequisites vRA 8: NSX-T account connected Basic infrastructure configured (Projects, Cloud Zones, Flavor Mappings, Image Mappings) NSX-T: logical router (tier-0 or tier-1) configured logical segment(s) attached to a logical router Process Overview Set up the existing networks with IP ranges you want to use for the machines.
